DOC.brief_summary: The propose study aim characterize biological ankle joint function walk run slope order develop advance powered ankle-foot prosthesis . Ankle joint torque angle data collect non-amputees walking run multiple speed slope . This data use develop control parameter power ankle-foot prosthesis . Then , parameter implement test powered prosthesis worn people knee amputation .
DOC.brief_title: Characterizing Ankle Function During Sloped Locomotion Prosthesis Development
